briefTitle: A Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Combination With XELOX or FOLFOX-4 in Patients With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer.

outcomeMeasures.title: Time Zero to Last Measurable Plasma Concentration of Bevacizumab
outcomeMeasures.description: Area under the serum concentration-time curve from time zero to the time of the last measurable plasma concentration (AUC 0-last). Estimation of the parameter was performed using non-compartmental methods.

outcomeMeasures.title: Weekly Steady-state Exposure of Bevacizumab
outcomeMeasures.description: Area under the serum concentration-time curve per week, at steady state (AUCss per week). Estimation of the parameter was performed using non-compartmental methods.

outcomeMeasures.title: Steady-state Exposure of Bevacizumab From Time Zero to Tau
outcomeMeasures.description: Area under the serum concentration-time curve from time zero to tau, at steady state (AUCss 0-tau), where tau was the length of the cycle, i.e., tau = 3 weeks for XELOX+BV and tau = 2 weeks for FOLFOX-4+BEV. Estimation of the parameter was performed using non-compartmental methods.

outcomeMeasures.title: Maximum Serum Concentration of Bevacizumab at Steady State
outcomeMeasures.description: Maximum serum concentration at steady state (Css,max). Estimation of the parameter was performed using non-compartmental methods.

outcomeMeasures.title: Minimum Serum Concentration of Bevacizumab at Steady State
outcomeMeasures.description: Minimum serum concentration at steady state (Css, min). Estimation of the parameter was performed using non-compartmental methods.

outcomeMeasures.title: Serum Clearance of Bevacizumab
outcomeMeasures.description: Serum clearance (CL). Estimation of the parameter was performed using non-compartmental methods.

outcomeMeasures.title: Time of Maximum Serum Concentration of Bevacizumab
outcomeMeasures.description: Time of maximum serum concentration (tmax). Estimation of the parameter was performed using non-compartmental methods.

outcomeMeasures.title: Volume of Distribution of Bevacizumab at Steady State
outcomeMeasures.description: Volume of distribution at steady state (Vss). Estimation of the parameter was performed using non-compartmental methods.

outcomeMeasures.title: Terminal Half-life of Bevacizumab
outcomeMeasures.description: Terminal half-life (t1/2) (apparent elimination half-life). Estimation of the parameter was performed using non-compartmental methods.
